nodes.bodyText: Could you explain how we could have leftover progress here?

@dimitris-athanasiou the overall change only partially handles the race condition window.

force close a job
persist progress
delete job (deletes previous progress)
job finally fires onCancelled()
job sees that there was no previous progress persisted
persists the new progress
OK, I think we can then remove the assertion here entirely. I'll add a test dedicated to deleting a job and checking things like the stored progress doc was cleaned up in a separate PR.
